BBEX3.M.GNF.USD.CA.AA.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Guinea / USD 1 = GNF ... (buying)
Source: Since 2006: Banque Internationale pour le Commerce et L`Industrie de la Guinee, Conakry. 1990 - 2005: Banque Centrale de la Republique de Guinee, Conakry.

Comment on 2004-07: On 2 July 2004, the Guinean franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).  1 July 2004: EUR 1 = GNF 1,990.00 / 2,010.00  14 July 2004: EUR 1 = GNF 2,487,50 / 2,512,50.  Calculated devaluation: 20.0%.
Comment on 2009-12: Exchange rate as of 24 December 2009.
Comment on 2010-07: Exchange rate as of 2 August 2010.
Comment on 2014-01: Exchange rate as of 6 February 2014.
Comment on 2014-07: Exchange rate as of 7 August 2014.
